achievements-pretitle: We will continue to delight you and always improve our services
service-other-card-paragraph: A virtual office saves on staff and rent. Calls are forwarded without direct contact. 24/7 access from anywhere in the world. Communication with a professional without interruptions.
service-other-card-paragraph-second: A quick and accurate way to gather your audience's opinions. Optimizing decisions based on real data.
service-other-card-paragraph-third: The service allows you to quickly notify subscribers about events or new products. Effective automatic and manual notification, with delivery of reports.
service-other-card-paragraph-four: Efficient and immediate response to customer questions 24/7. Personalized approach, automation of routine requests and improved customer satisfaction. Your key to continuous and high-quality communication.
community-paragraph: The team at the Contact Center 'Uzbektelecom'  JSC has been operating for over 10 years. During this time, the number of clients using our services has been increasing, as well as the size of our team each year. In our team, despite the different ages of the employees, everyone works in a friendly atmosphere.
join-paragraph: Join us and embark on a rewarding career as a Customer Service Professional! Benefit from our friendly team environment, state-of-the-art office facilities, and ample growth opportunities. Submit your resume today, and let's achieve success together!
